bike.description: Platinum Series 6066 butted & hydroformed aluminum, eccentric BB, cold-forged dropouts, G2 29" Geometry

components.description: Fox F80RL 29, 80mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 51mm offset crown, air spring, external rebound & lockout
Bontrager Race Disc front hub/Bontrager Race sealed micro-cassette rear singlespeed hub, Bontrager Duster 29 tubeless ready* 28mm wide disc rims, 32h
Bontrager XDX, 29x2.1 (53/51), tubeless ready, abrasion resistant,120 TPI aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race Big Sweep, 620mm width, 12d backsweep, 31.8mm
Avid BB7, mechanical disc, 160mm Roundagon 6-bolt rotors
